DOC.brief_summary: Patients advanced esophageal cancer receive thoracic radiation therapy 60Gy 30 fraction , concurrent s-1 nedaplatin .
DOC.brief_title: S-1 Plus Nedaplatin With Concurrent Radiotherapy Advanced Esophageal Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose : To determine maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) recommend dose ( RD ) S-1 combination nedaplatin thoracic radiotherapy patient advanced esophageal Cancer . Methods : Thoracic radiation therapy administer 2Gy fraction five time weekly total dose 60 Gy.Concurrently , nedaplatin give fix dose 75 mg/m2 Days 1 , s-1 give Days 1-14 , repeat every 4 week four cycle . The dose s-1 initially 60 mg/m2/day gradually increased determine MTD RD regimen .
DOC.criteria: Histologic proof primary squamous cell adenocarcinoma esophagus Locoregionally advance carcinoma esophagus without systemic metastasis Zubrod Performance Status 01 ; Patients ≥ 18 year age ; No hypersensitivity E. coli −derived product ; AGC ≥ 1500/mm3 , platelet ≥ 150,000/mm3 , Hgb ≥ 10 gm % , serum creatinine ≤ 1.5 mg/dl and/or calculate creatinine clearance ≥ 65 cc/min ; serum calcium ≤ 11gm/dl ; Patients prior malignancy eligible curable nonmelanoma skin cancer cervical cancer situ disease free ≥ 5 year ; No prior chest upper abdomen radiotherapy ; prior systemic chemotherapy within past 5 year ; prior esophageal gastric surgery ; Written inform consent . Evidence tracheoesophageal fistula , invasion trachea major bronchus . Prior invasive malignancy ( except nonmelanomatous skin cancer ) unless disease free minimum 2 year ( For example , carcinoma situ breast , oral cavity , cervix permissible ) .
